content.content: Weekly MIPs Update #106       1024×1024 60.6 KB      September Ratification Polls closed today.     September Ratification Polls: Outcomes We’ve got six Formal Submissions for the September Governance Cycle; their Ratification Polls went up on September 12 and closed today on September 26 after a two-week run. Here’s a summary of the outcomes:  The Strategic Happiness Core Unit offboarding was rejected. The MIP61 (Delegate Compensation) amendment that shortens the measurement period for delegate participation metrics passed. From now on, the shorter of 1) the previous 120 days or 2) since becoming a Recognized Delegate will be used to calculate participation metrics. The MakerDAO Delegates MIP Set that aimed to formalize the role of delegates and their compensation within the MIPs Framework was rejected. The 81k SPF to fund further work from the Ambassador Program team was accepted. GovAlpha’s MKR budget passed. Its 1.5 multiplier option (330.27 Total MKR) was the winning option. GovAlpha’s MKR budgets are semi-annual. StarkNet Engineering Core Unit’s (SNE-001) MKR budget passed. It totals 810 MKR, with a one-off transfer of 270 MKR and a stream of 540 MKR ending on September 28, 2024.  And here’s a table for good measure:     Proposal Summary Impact (?) Outcome     MIP39c3-SP2: Strategic Happiness Core Unit (SH-001) Offboarding GovAlpha Summary High  Link    MIP4c2-SP24: Amend Measurement Period For Delegate Participation Metrics GovAlpha Summary High  Link    MakerDAO Delegates MIP Set TBD High  Link    MIP55c3-SP7: Special Purpose Fund for The Ambassador Program GovAlpha Summary High  Link    MIP40c3-SP80: Modify GovAlpha Core Unit MKR Budget - Q3 2022 GovAlpha Summary High  Link    MIP40c3-SP79: MKR Compensation for StarkeNet Engineering Core Unit (SNE-001) GovAlpha Summary High  Link      October Governance Cycle The Formal Submission Window for the October Governance Cycle opens on Monday, October 3, and closes on Wednesday, October 5. The Frozen Period will kick in on September 28, i.e., all non-cosmetic modifications past that point are a no-no for proposals aiming to enter the October cycle. The following list contains proposals that were recently published and are eligible to enter the October Governance Cycle. Endgame-related proposals are marked with .     Code and Title Summary Impact (?) Author     MIP4c2-SP27: MIP16 Amendment Subproposal  TBD High @rune   MIP83: Recognized Launch MetaDAO Clusters  TBD High @rune   MIP84: Activate Protocol Owned Vault Emulation  TBD High @rune   MIP1c4-SP1: Subproposal for Changing the Problem Space  TBD High @rune   MIP85: LDO-to-MKR OTC Swap  TBD High @rune   MIP4c4-SP1: MIP Removal Subproposals  TBD High @rune   Core Unit Mandate Modifications  MIP39c2-SP35: Modifying Risk Core Unit Mandate - RISK-001 MIP39c2-SP36: Modifying Strategic Finance Core Unit Mandate (SF-001) MIP39c2-SP37: Modifying Collateral Engineering Services Core Unit Mandate (CES-001)   SP35 SP36 SP37  High @rune   Core Unit Offboardings  MIP39c3-SP3: Offboarding the Strategic Happiness Core Unit (SH-001) MIP39c3-SP4: Offboarding the Events Core Unit (EVENTS-001) MIP39c3-SP5: Offboarding the Real-world Finance Core Unit (RWF-001)  TBD High @rune   MIP81: Coinbase USDC Institutional Rewards TBD High @CB_Institutional   MIP82: Monetalis/Coinbase Appaloosa TBD High @Allan_Pedersen   MIP55c3-SP9: Legal and Commercial Risk Domain Work on Greenlit Collateral BlockTower Credit (RWA Arranger) SPF TBD Medium @Aes   MIP80: MKR Compensation Guidelines TBD High @CodeKnight   MIP4c2-SP27: Amend Minimum Feedback Period for Facilitator Offboarding GovAlpha Summary High @CodeKnight   MIP41c5-SP12: RWF-001 Facilitator Offboarding GovAlpha Summary High @ultraschuppi    To see the full list of proposals in RFC, go to the RFC subcategory.  November-cycle Eligible Proposals The following proposals are eligible to enter the November Governance Cycle at the earliest.     Code and Title Summary Impact (?) Author     MIP86: CoinShares USDC Institutional Rewards TBD High @CoinSharesCo     Weekly Governance Cycle A new SPF request, MIP55c3-SP10: Pioneer a DeFi-Native Dataset for Modelling Sentiment-driven Dynamics and Risks, was posted on Friday. As per MIP55c3, it will be eligible to enter the Weekly Governance Cycle, on October 3, after the two-week Feedback Period and one-week possibly overlapping Frozen periods have finished.   Help! For anything MIP-related: reach out to @gala, @sebix, or @blimpa. blimpa:  September Ratification Polls closed today.   … and Tom Hanks is not particularly amused by the fact.
